Package gg.w6.chesslib.model

Class Offset

java.lang.Object
gg.w6.chesslib.model.Offset
public class Offset extends Object
Represents an offset on a chessboard.

Offsets are used to define the movement of pieces in different directions.

    • valueOf

      @NotNull public static @NotNull Offset valueOf(int files, int ranks)
      Creates or retrieves an Offset instance for the given files and ranks.
      Parameters:
      files - The number of files (horizontal movement).
      ranks - The number of ranks (vertical movement).
      Returns:
      Cached Offset instance or new one if out of bounds.

    • extendFrom

      @NotNull public @NotNull Iterable<Coordinate> extendFrom(Coordinate origin, int range)
      Lazily extends the offset from the given origin coordinate by the specified range. Stops iteration if out of bounds.
      Parameters:
      origin - The origin coordinate.
      range - The maximum number of steps.
      Returns:
      Iterable of coordinates.

    • computeExtension

      @NotNull public @NotNull List<Coordinate> computeExtension(Coordinate origin, int range)
      Eagerly computes the extension list. Does not include coordinates out of bounds.
      Parameters:
      origin - The origin coordinate.
      range - The maximum number of steps.
      Returns:
      List of coordinates.

    • applyTo

      @Nullable public @Nullable Coordinate applyTo(Coordinate origin)
      Applies this offset to the given coordinate.
      Parameters:
      origin - The origin coordinate.
      Returns:
      New coordinate or null if out of bounds.

      Scales this offset by the given factor.
      Parameters:
      factor - The scaling factor.
      Returns:
